channel.title: The Splatt Show!
channel.googleplay:author: Sam Fields and Hayden Platt
channel.itunes:author: Sam Fields and Hayden Platt
channel.itunes:summary: Podcast where two old friends examine all kinds of games from a design perspective, argue over the tiniest details, and somehow make bad jokes funny!

item.title: The Splatt Show! Episode 1 - Shovel Knight; Capturing the "Retro" Aesthetic
item.itunes:summary: The premiere episode of Sam and Hayden's new podcast! Join us as we discuss our takeaways from Yacht Club Games' Shovel Knight, the Pokemon Go Plus, and discuss some old rental gems!
item.itunes:author: thesplattshow@gmail.com

item.title: The Splatt Show! Episode 2 - Guacamelee; Breaking Down Co-Op Flow
item.itunes:summary: Round 2 of Sam and Hayden's new podcast, now with gameplay footage and a webcam ! Join us as we discuss our takeaways from Drinkbox Studios' Guacamelee, Battle.net's name change, and some N64 throwback!
item.itunes:author: thesplattshow@gmail.com

item.title: The Splatt Show! Episode 3 - IndieCade Special; Journey
item.itunes:summary: Freshly back from IndieCade we cover Sam's experience as an attendee and Hayden's as a nominee representative, before examining Journey's place in the world of artistic / experiential games.
item.itunes:author: thesplattshow@gmail.com

item.title: The Splatt Show! Episode 4 - Day of the Devs Special; Westerado's Open World
item.itunes:summary: Sam and Platt report in with some day-after Day of the Devs coverage and their thoughts on the Nintendo Switch, all before taking a deep dive into Westerado's uniquely small, yet extra-open open world!
item.itunes:author: thesplattshow@gmail.com

item.title: The Splatt Show! Episode 5 - Streamline; Tackling Twitch Integration
item.itunes:summary: Join Sam and Platt in the FIFTH (not 6th) Splatt Show installment! We check out Proletariat's Twitch-viewer integrated game Streamline, discuss the medium's potential, and reminisce on some handheld classics!
item.itunes:author: thesplattshow@gmail.com

item.title: The Splatt Show! Episode 6 - Gone Home; The Power of Environmental Storytelling
item.itunes:summary: Sam 'n' Platt kick off the new year with a look at Gone Home, what makes environmental storytelling so dang cool, SteamSpy stats, and a hearty discussion about Glover speedrunning!
item.itunes:author: thesplattshow@gmail.com

item.title: The Splatt Show! Episode 7 - Deus Ex: Human Revolution; Creating Systems for Emergent Gameplay
item.itunes:summary: Back for the 7th installment of The Splatt Show, Sam and Platt discuss the intricacies that make Deus Ex: Human Revolution so dang cool. Stay tuned in the back half for a special news brief and an exhilarating discussion on ranch dressing!
item.itunes:author: thesplattshow@gmail.com

item.title: The Splatt Show! Episode 8 - Kerbal Space Program; Designing Without Explicit Player Goals
item.itunes:summary: The Splatt duo returns with special guest Samuel Reha, in hearty discussion all about the enigma that is Kerbal Space Program! The gang also shares their thoughts on the Nintendo Switch release, and reflects on the wacky N64 Disk Drive.
item.itunes:author: thesplattshow@gmail.com

item.title: The Splatt Show! Episode 9 - Inside; Creating a Compelling Experience Without Dialogue
item.itunes:summary: Back again in the heat of summer, Sam 'n' Platt jump on the mic to discuss Playdead's highly polished game, Inside! Stick around in the back half to hear our thoughts on some E3 announcements, and the infamous THUNDER KNEE!!
item.itunes:author: thesplattshow@gmail.com

item.title: The Splatt Show! Episode 10 - Zelda: Breath of the Wild; Creating Density in an Open World
item.itunes:summary: After 5 long months digesting Nintendo's latest Zelda entry, Sam and Platt spill their thoughts on what makes this game so irresistible, along with a few instances where the experience falls short. Check it out!
item.itunes:author: thesplattshow@gmail.com

item.itunes:summary: The Splatt squad adventures underwater to dissect ABZÃ› and the tradeoffs of reaching a broader audience. With choice new overlays, the two also discuss the Game Awards and a particularly puzzling random word?
item.itunes:author: thesplattshow@gmail.com

item.title: The Splatt Show! Episode 12 - Full Throttle Remastered; The Evolution of Design
item.itunes:summary: Sam and Platt take a trip back to the decade of their birth with the remastered version of Doublefine's 1995 point-and-click romp Full Throttle. No punches are pulled as they deconstruct a game that came out while they were still pooping their diapers. In the words of Ben Throttle, "I'm not putting my lips on that."
item.itunes:author: thesplattshow@gmail.com

item.title: The Splatt Show! Episode 13 - Wizard of Legend; Limiting Information
item.itunes:summary: The boys are back with a fresh track! They tackle Wizard of Legend, the action-packed new roguelike that makes the player feel like Naruto, despite some drawbacks like a troubling lack of item descriptions. Will Sam and Platt conquer the Chaos Trials, or buster out?? Find out next time, on Naruto!
item.itunes:author: thesplattshow@gmail.com
